name: Grapnel Conekt
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys to move left or right.

Click to shoot the hook

E - Interact

R - Reload

Backspace within the Game to return to main menu.                                                             

------

There's been a short circuit inside our "Big T" robot. Now it's on our Mr. Microbot to save the day!

Help this small microbot to grapple its way through and and connect the disconnected ports within T. There are obstacles as usual but you have to use them to your cause. But first switch off the electricity to avoid shocks.  Use your Grappling Hook to connect to moveable blocks and build your way out after you switch the current on again. But the irony is that you have only one hook. 

Can you make microbot come out safely after all..?
